018package org.tquadrat.bloodpressure;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil.resolveText;
022
023import org.apiguardian.api.API;
024import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Text;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Translation;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.RangeMap;
028
029/**
030 *  The different categories for blood pressure values.
031 *
032 *  @version $Id: Diagnosis.java 126 2022-02-19 21:13:35Z tquadrat $
033 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
034 *  @UMLGraph.link
035 *  @since 0.0.1
036 */
037@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Diagnosis.java 126 2022-02-19 21:13:35Z tquadrat $" )
038@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
039public enum Diagnosis
040{
041        /*------------------*\
042    ====** Enum Definitions **=================================================
043        \*------------------*/
044    /**
045     *  The blood pressure is low.
046     */
047    @Text
048    (
049        description = "Low blood pressure",
050        translations =
051        {
052            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Niedrig" ),
053            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Low" )
054        }
055    )
056    LOW,
057
058    /**
059     *  The blood pressure is optimal.
060     */
061    @Text
062    (
063        description = "Optimal blood pressure",
064        translations =
065        {
066            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Optimal" ),
067            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Optimal" )
068        }
069    )
070    OPTIMAL,
071
072    /**
073     *  The blood pressure is normal.
074     */
075    @Text
076    (
077        description = "Normal blood pressure",
078        translations =
079        {
080            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Normal" ),
081            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Normal" )
082        }
083    )
084    NORMAL,
085
086    /**
087     *  The blood pressure is high normal.
088     */
089    @SuppressWarnings( "SpellCheckingInspection" )
090    @Text
091    (
092        description = "Higher than normal blood pressure",
093        translations =
094        {
095            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Hochnormal" ),
096            @Translation( language = "en", text = "High-Normal" )
097        }
098    )
099    NORMAL_HIGH,
100
101    /**
102     *  The blood pressure is hypertonic, level 1.
103     */
104    @Text
105    (
106        description = "Level 1 high blood pressure",
107        translations =
108        {
109            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Hypertonie Grad 1" ),
110            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Hypertonie Level 1" )
111        }
112    )
113    HIGH1,
114
115    /**
116     *  The blood pressure is hypertonic, level 2.
117     */
118    @Text
119    (
120        description = "Level 2 high blood pressure",
121        translations =
122        {
123            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Hypertonie Grad 2" ),
124            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Hypertonie Level 2" )
125        }
126    )
127    HIGH2,
128
129    /**
130     *  The blood pressure is hypertonic, level 2.
131     */
132    @Text
133    (
134        description = "Level 3 high blood pressure",
135        translations =
136        {
137            @Translation( language = "de", text = "Hypertonie Grad 3" ),
138            @Translation( language = "en", text = "Hypertonie Level 3" )
139        }
140    )
141    HIGH3;
142
143        /*------------------------*\
144    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
145        \*------------------------*/
146    /**
147     *  The assessment table for the diastolic blood pressure values.
148     */
149    private static final RangeMap<Diagnosis> m_DiastolicTable;
150
151    /**
152     *  The assessment table for the systolic blood pressure values.
153     */
154    private static final RangeMap<Diagnosis> m_SystolicTable;
155
156    static
157    {
158        //---* The table for the systolic values *-----------------------------
159        m_SystolicTable = RangeMap.of( HIGH3, false )
160            .addRange( 105.0, LOW )
161            .addRange( 120.0, OPTIMAL )
162            .addRange( 130.0, NORMAL )
163            .addRange( 140.0, NORMAL_HIGH )
164            .addRange( 160.0, HIGH1 )
165            .addRange( 180.0, HIGH2 );
166
167        //---* The table for the diastolic values *----------------------------
168        m_DiastolicTable = RangeMap.of( HIGH3, false )
169            .addRange( 65.0, LOW )
170            .addRange( 80.0, OPTIMAL )
171            .addRange( 85.0, NORMAL )
172            .addRange( 90.0, NORMAL_HIGH )
173            .addRange( 100.0, HIGH1 )
174            .addRange( 110.0, HIGH2 );
175
176    }
177
178        /*------------*\
179    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
180        \*------------*/
181    /**
182     *  The configuration used by this program.
183     */
184    private final Configuration m_Configuration;
185
186        /*--------------*\
187    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
188        \*--------------*/
189    /**
190     *  Creates a new instance of {@code Diagnosis}.
191     */
192    private Diagnosis()
193    {
194        m_Configuration = Configuration.getInstance();
195    }   //  Diagnosis()
196
197        /*---------*\
198    ====** Methods **==========================================================
199        \*---------*/
200    /**
201     *  Assess the diastolic pressure.
202     *
203     *  @param  value   The diastolic pressure.
204     *  @return The diagnosis.
205     */
206    public static final Diagnosis assessDiastolicPressure( final int value )
207    {
208        final var retValue = m_DiastolicTable.get( value );
209
210        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
211        return retValue;
212    }   //  assessDiastolicPressure()
213
214    /**
215     *  Assess the systolic pressure.
216     *
217     *  @param  value   The systolic pressure.
218     *  @return The diagnosis.
219     */
220    public static final Diagnosis assessSystolicPressure( final int value )
221    {
222        final var retValue = m_SystolicTable.get( value );
223
224        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
225        return retValue;
226    }   //  assessSystolicPressure()
227
228    /**
229     *  <p>{@summary Combines the given diagnosis.}</p>
230     *
231     *  @param  systolic    The diagnosis for the systolic pressure.
232     *  @param  diastolic   The diagnosis for the diastolic pressure.
233     *  @return The combined diagnosis.
234     */
235    public static final Diagnosis combineDiagnosis( final Diagnosis systolic, final Diagnosis diastolic )
236    {
237        final var retValue = systolic.compareTo( diastolic ) > 0 ? systolic : diastolic;
238
239        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
240        return retValue;
241    }   //  combineDiagnosis()
242
243    /**
244     *  {@inheritDoc}
245     */
246    @Override
247    public final String toString()
248    {
249        final var retValue = resolveText( m_Configuration.getResourceBundle(), this );
250
251        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
252        return retValue;
253    }   //  toString()
254}
255//  enum Diagnosis
256
257/*
258 *  End of File
259 */
